data.description: Beds: 6 Baths: 6 Overview Beautifully Furnished 6 Bedroom Villa with 2 BQs in Pinnock Beach Estate, Lekki, Lagos Experience unparalleled luxury in this exquisitely furnished 6-bedroom villa, gracefully located within Pinnock Beach Estate in Lekki, Lagos. Every detail of this beautifully built home has been meticulously crafted to offer a harmonious blend of modern sophistication and coastal elegance. The villa boasts six expansive en-suite bedrooms that provide serene private retreats, complemented by two well-appointed BQ perfect for staff or guests. The spacious open plan living and dining areas are designed for both comfort and entertaining, boasti high ceilings, abundant natural light, and stylish finishes throughout. A state-of-the-art kitchen, equipped with premium appliances and sleek cabinetry, is a culinary delight. Outside, a landscaped garden and inviting outdoor seating areas enhance the villa‚Äôs charm, creating an oasis of relaxation in the heart of Pinnock Beach Estate. With 24/7 security and easy access to upscale amenities, this property represents the epitome of luxury living in one of Lagos‚Äô most coveted locations.
